20101222030037.000|20101222030039.000|TR0|tonight.  But, before he went in, he spoke

20101222030225.000|20101222030226.000|TR0|Now, on 9/11, he, John, joined the army of 
20101222030226.000|20101222030228.000|TR0|demolition workers who rushed to Ground 
20101222030228.000|20101222030230.000|TR0|Zero, clearing wreckage, trying to locate

20101222030232.000|20101222030234.000|TR0|September, he lost his left foot when a 
20101222030234.000|20101222030236.000|TR0|steel beam crushed it.
20101222030236.000|20101222030238.000|TR0|
20101222030238.000|20101222030240.000|TR0|Now, he, like many other volunteers, did

20101222030244.000|20101222030245.000|TR0|comp. Others who got workman's comp can no 
20101222030245.000|20101222030247.000|TR0|longer afford the co-pays.

20101222030740.000|20101222030742.000|TR0|every single day where members say, we 
20101222030742.000|20101222030744.000|TR0|want amendments, we want debate, we want 
20101222030744.000|20101222030746.000|TR0|an amendment, but we're still a no.
20101222030746.000|20101222030748.000|TR0|
20101222030748.000|20101222030750.000|TR0|And then we stand up and say, oh, if only 
20101222030750.000|20101222030752.000|TR0|we had a different process, we'd vote yes.
20101222030752.000|20101222030754.000|TR0|
20101222030754.000|20101222030756.000|TR0|You vote yes if you believe yes!  You vote 
20101222030756.000|20101222030758.000|TR0|in favor of something if you believe it is 
20101222030758.000|20101222030759.000|TR0|the right thing!  If you believe it is the 
20101222030759.000|20101222030801.000|TR0|wrong thing, you vote no!
20101222030801.000|20101222030803.000|TR0|
20101222030803.000|20101222030805.000|TR0|We are following a procedure.

20101222033814.000|20101222033815.000|TR0|GUPTA:  In "Crime  &  Punishment" tonight, 
20101222033815.000|20101222033817.000|TR0|justice for a toddler. I want to show you 
20101222033817.000|20101222033819.000|TR0|her picture.  This is Cassie Castens.  It 
20101222033819.000|20101222033821.000|TR0|will be ten years next month since she 
20101222033821.000|20101222033823.000|TR0|died.  I imagine it's a tough time of year 
20101222033823.000|20101222033825.000|TR0|for her family.  Cassie's mom left her 
20101222033825.000|20101222033827.000|TR0|with someone she trusted. While she was 
20101222033827.000|20101222033829.000|TR0|gone, Cassie suffered a severe head injury.
20101222033829.000|20101222033831.000|TR0|
20101222033831.000|20101222033832.000|TR0|I can tell you as a doctor, but more 
20101222033832.000|20101222033834.000|TR0|importantly as a father of three young 
20101222033834.000|20101222033836.000|TR0|girls, this story really got to me when I 
20101222033836.000|20101222033838.000|TR0|first heard about it.  How Cassie got 
20101222033838.000|20101222033840.000|TR0|those fatal head injuries remained a 
20101222033840.000|20101222033842.000|TR0|mystery for years.  But to some in 
20101222033842.000|20101222033844.000|TR0|Cassie's family, the facts didn't quite 
20101222033844.000|20101222033846.000|TR0|add up.  Turns out they were right.
20101222033846.000|20101222033848.000|TR0|
20101222033848.000|20101222033849.000|TR0|Here's Randi Kaye.
20101222033849.000|20101222033851.000|TR0|
20101222033851.000|20101222033853.000|TR0|(BEGIN VIDEOTAPE)
20101222033853.000|20101222033855.000|TR0|
20101222033855.000|20101222033857.000|TR0|KAYE (voice-over):  In the morning of 
20101222033857.000|20101222033859.000|TR0|January 18, 2001, the only person at home 
20101222033859.000|20101222033901.000|TR0|with Cassie was her mother's boyfriend, 
20101222033901.000|20101222033903.000|TR0|former Marine, William Veach.  Just before 
20101222033903.000|20101222033905.000|TR0|10 a.m., Veach called 911.
20101222033905.000|20101222033906.000|TR0|
20101222033906.000|20101222033908.000|TR0|By the time paramedics arrived, Cassie, 
20101222033908.000|20101222033910.000|TR0|just 17 months, was unconscious.  Doctors 
20101222033910.000|20101222033912.000|TR0|described her brain as JELL-O.  There was 
20101222033912.000|20101222033914.000|TR0|severe hemorrhaging, lots of blood.  
20101222033914.000|20101222033916.000|TR0|Doctors immediately suspected shaken baby 
20101222033916.000|20101222033918.000|TR0|syndrome.
20101222033918.000|20101222033920.000|TR0|
20101222033920.000|20101222033922.000|TR0|But when police questioned Veach, seen 
20101222033922.000|20101222033924.000|TR0|here in this interrogation video, he 
20101222033924.000|20101222033925.000|TR0|denied harming the toddler.  Veach told 
20101222033925.000|20101222033927.000|TR0|police Cassie was in her highchair eating 
20101222033927.000|20101222033929.000|TR0|Cheerios.  When he turned his back to 
20101222033929.000|20101222033931.000|TR0|answer the phone, he said he heard a thud. 
20101222033931.000|20101222033933.000|TR0|      WILLIAM VEACH, SUSPECT:  There's two 
20101222033933.000|20101222033935.000|TR0|thumps.  The first one I can only assume 
20101222033935.000|20101222033937.000|TR0|was the kitchen table.
20101222033937.000|20101222033939.000|TR0|
20101222033939.000|20101222033941.000|TR0|KAYE:  Veach said Cassie fell out of her 
20101222033941.000|20101222033942.000|TR0|highchair, but Cassie's highchair was just 
20101222033942.000|20101222033944.000|TR0|30 inches from the ground.  Just 2 1/2 
20101222033944.000|20101222033946.000|TR0|feet.
20101222033946.000|20101222033948.000|TR0|
20101222033948.000|20101222033950.000|TR0|LINDA CASTENS, CASSIE'S GRANDDAUGHTER:  It 
20101222033950.000|20101222033952.000|TR0|just didn't make sense that she would 
20101222033952.000|20101222033954.000|TR0|fall, and from that short fall, that she 
20101222033954.000|20101222033956.000|TR0|would be in such critical condition.
20101222033956.000|20101222033958.000|TR0|
20101222033958.000|20101222033959.000|TR0|KAYE:  Doctors couldn't save her.  Fifteen 
20101222033959.000|20101222034001.000|TR0|days after she was rushed to the hospital, 
20101222034001.000|20101222034003.000|TR0|the little girl with the sparkling blue 
20101222034003.000|20101222034005.000|TR0|eyes and blond pigtails was dead.
20101222034005.000|20101222034007.000|TR0|
20101222034007.000|20101222034009.000|TR0|(on camera) The medical examiner ruled 
20101222034009.000|20101222034011.000|TR0|Cassie had died of blunt force head 
20101222034011.000|20101222034013.000|TR0|injuries but couldn't say for sure how it 
20101222034013.000|20101222034015.000|TR0|happened or if a crime had been committed. 
20101222034015.000|20101222034016.000|TR0| So prosecutors in Yuma County, Arizona, 
20101222034016.000|20101222034018.000|TR0|chose not to charge Veach because of lack 
20101222034018.000|20101222034020.000|TR0|of evidence.
20101222034020.000|20101222034022.000|TR0|
20101222034022.000|20101222034024.000|TR0|The file on Cassie was officially closed 
20101222034024.000|20101222034026.000|TR0|in 2003.  Veach was a free man.
20101222034026.000|20101222034028.000|TR0|
20101222034028.000|20101222034030.000|TR0|(voice-over) Fast forward a few years to 
20101222034030.000|20101222034032.000|TR0|February 2006, when Cassie's case landed 
20101222034032.000|20101222034034.000|TR0|on the desk of Julie Haney, a cold case 
20101222034034.000|20101222034035.000|TR0|investigator for NCIS, the Naval Criminal 
20101222034035.000|20101222034037.000|TR0|Investigative Service. Because Veach was a 
20101222034037.000|20101222034039.000|TR0|Marine, a case file had been created years 
20101222034039.000|20101222034041.000|TR0|earlier.
20101222034041.000|20101222034043.000|TR0|
20101222034043.000|20101222034045.000|TR0|HANEY:  Common sense and 24 years of doing 
20101222034045.000|20101222034047.000|TR0|this told me that it didn't add up.
20101222034047.000|20101222034049.000|TR0|
20101222034049.000|20101222034051.000|TR0|KAYE:  Haney started to piece together 
20101222034051.000|20101222034052.000|TR0|what happened.  For inspiration, she 
20101222034052.000|20101222034054.000|TR0|posted this picture at her desk.
20101222034054.000|20101222034056.000|TR0|
20101222034056.000|20101222034058.000|TR0|HANEY:  It just kind of reminds me of what 
20101222034058.000|20101222034100.000|TR0|-- why I'm here.  What -- you know, who 
20101222034100.000|20101222034102.000|TR0|I'm working for.
20101222034102.000|20101222034104.000|TR0|
20101222034104.000|20101222034106.000|TR0|KAYE:  Julie Haney turned the case file 
20101222034106.000|20101222034108.000|TR0|inside out, starting with Veach's 
20101222034108.000|20101222034109.000|TR0|interrogation video.
20101222034109.000|20101222034111.000|TR0|
20101222034111.000|20101222034113.000|TR0|HANEY:  Watching his video I got the sense 
20101222034113.000|20101222034115.000|TR0|that -- that those were crocodile tears.  
20101222034115.000|20101222034117.000|TR0|Those were not for Cassie; those were for 
20101222034117.000|20101222034119.000|TR0|him.
20101222034119.000|20101222034121.000|TR0|
20101222034121.000|20101222034123.000|TR0|KAYE:  Haney found the biggest problem 
20101222034123.000|20101222034125.000|TR0|with the case was the early diagnosis of 
20101222034125.000|20101222034126.000|TR0|shaken baby syndrome.  From day one she 
20101222034126.000|20101222034128.000|TR0|said that threw the case off course.  Her 
20101222034128.000|20101222034130.000|TR0|own investigation found Cassie hadn't been 
20101222034130.000|20101222034132.000|TR0|shaken at all.  She'd been slammed.
20101222034132.000|20101222034134.000|TR0|
20101222034134.000|20101222034136.000|TR0|HANEY:  I think William lost control and, 
20101222034136.000|20101222034138.000|TR0|in a moment of rage, he -- he killed 
20101222034138.000|20101222034140.000|TR0|Cassie.  He struck her with some very hard 
20101222034140.000|20101222034142.000|TR0|object, or took her and used her as some 
20101222034142.000|20101222034143.000|TR0|kind of a weapon and struck her into a 
20101222034143.000|20101222034145.000|TR0|very hard object like the corner of my 
20101222034145.000|20101222034147.000|TR0|desk here or a wall, something very, very 
20101222034147.000|20101222034149.000|TR0|hard.  Because it bashed the left -- the 
20101222034149.000|20101222034151.000|TR0|right side of her brain in.
20101222034151.000|20101222034153.000|TR0|
20101222034153.000|20101222034155.000|TR0|KAYE (on camera):  Haney had Cassie's 
20101222034155.000|20101222034157.000|TR0|X-rays and autopsy slides re-examined at 
20101222034157.000|20101222034159.000|TR0|the Armed Forces Institute of Pathology in 
20101222034159.000|20101222034201.000|TR0|Washington, D.C., where military 
20101222034201.000|20101222034202.000|TR0|pathologists caught something doctors 
20101222034202.000|20101222034204.000|TR0|missed all those years ago.
20101222034204.000|20101222034206.000|TR0|
20101222034206.000|20101222034208.000|TR0|HANEY:  The trauma was limited to the 
20101222034208.000|20101222034210.000|TR0|right side of her head.  If you're shaken, 
20101222034210.000|20101222034212.000|TR0|you have trauma to your whole brain.  You 
20101222034212.000|20101222034214.000|TR0|don't have trauma only on one side.  So 
20101222034214.000|20101222034216.000|TR0|they had the wrong theory of what happened 
20101222034216.000|20101222034218.000|TR0|the whole time.
20101222034218.000|20101222034219.000|TR0|
20101222034219.000|20101222034221.000|TR0|KAYE:  Haney's new evidence convinced the 
20101222034221.000|20101222034223.000|TR0|attorney general to prosecute Veach.  On 
20101222034223.000|20101222034225.000|TR0|January 17, 2008, almost seven years from 
20101222034225.000|20101222034227.000|TR0|the day Cassie was injured, Veach was 
20101222034227.000|20101222034229.000|TR0|charged with first-degree murder and child 
20101222034229.000|20101222034231.000|TR0|abuse.  He maintained his innocence, but 
20101222034231.000|20101222034233.000|TR0|when the state offered him a deal to plead 
20101222034233.000|20101222034235.000|TR0|guilty to a lesser charge, he jumped on it 
20101222034235.000|20101222034236.000|TR0|and pleaded guilty to manslaughter.
20101222034236.000|20101222034238.000|TR0|
20101222034238.000|20101222034240.000|TR0|VEACH:  I should have taken care -- I 
20101222034240.000|20101222034242.000|TR0|should have taken better care of you that 
20101222034242.000|20101222034244.000|TR0|day.
20101222034244.000|20101222034246.000|TR0|
20101222034246.000|20101222034248.000|TR0|KAYE (voice-over):  Veach never shared the
